mapper.select: select process_instance_id as processInstanceId, staff_id as staffId, goods_type as goodsType, goods_name as goodsName, goods_specs as goodsSpecs, goods_branch as goodsBranch, goods_quantity as goodsQuantity, url, status, goods_detail as goodsDetail from fy_purchase where process_instance_id=#{progressInstanceId} and staff_id=#{userId}
